```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
#Importing Data set after making some adjustments in excel
shark_data <- read.csv("../data/shark_data.csv")

```


```{r}
# Set Factors

shark_data$Area <- factor(shark_data$Area)
shark_data$Year <- factor(shark_data$Year)
shark_data$Species<- factor(shark_data$Species)

```

```{r}
# Creating Figure
catch_figure<- ggplot(shark_data, aes(x=Year, y=Count)) +
       geom_bar(aes(fill=Species),position=position_dodge(width=1), stat="identity") +
  facet_wrap(~Area) +
  ylab("Species Catch")

#ggsave(filename = "../output/catch_figure.jpg", plot=catch_figure, width=200, height = 140, units="mm")

```
